shops_data.name: besaid village shop
shops_data.note: Equipment becomes available after the tutorials are completed. Items are always available.

shops_data.name: kilika port shop
shops_data.note: Available after the party wakes up.

shops_data.name: luca stadium shop
shops_data.note: Becomes available after Auron joins the party.

shops_data.name: luca shop
shops_data.note: Becomes available after Auron joins the party.

shops_data.name: mushroom rock road o'aka 1
shops_data.note: Prices will vary depending on how much money you gave O'aka. < 100 Gil: 200%; > 100 Gil: 150%; > 1000 Gil: 120%; > 10000 Gil: 70%. Listed are the standard 100% prices.

shops_data.name: mushroom rock road o'aka 2
shops_data.note: Prices will vary depending on how much money you gave O'aka. < 100 Gil: 200%; > 100 Gil: 150%; > 1000 Gil: 120%; > 10000 Gil: 70%. Listed are the standard 100% prices.

shops_data.name: mushroom rock road o'aka 3
shops_data.note: Prices will vary depending on how much money you gave O'aka. < 100 Gil: 200%; > 100 Gil: 150%; > 1000 Gil: 120%; > 10000 Gil: 70%. Listed are the standard 100% prices.

shops_data.name: moonflow shop 1
shops_data.note: The woman by the stairs.

shops_data.name: moonflow shop 2
shops_data.note: The man next to the shoopuf.

shops_data.name: moonflow shop 3
shops_data.note: The man inside the tent.

shops_data.name: moonflow shop 4
shops_data.note: The woman in front of the tent. Appears after the cutscene and re-entering the screen.

shops_data.name: macalania woods o'aka
shops_data.note: Talk to O'aka a second time and he will ask you if his prices are too expensive. 'Too pricey.' decreases his prices by 25%, 'Just right.' leaves the prices unchanged, and 'Too cheap.' increases his prices by 25%. Listed are the default prices.

shops_data.name: lake macalania o'aka
shops_data.note: These prices are affected by the answer you gave O'aka in Macalania Woods, regarding his prices: 'Too pricey.': -25%; 'Just right.': unchanged; 'Too cheap.': +25%. If you didn't speak to him a second time earlier, these prices will be at their most expensive by default. Listed are the unchanged prices.

shops_data.name: macalania temple o'aka 1
shops_data.note: These prices are affected by the answer you gave O'aka in Macalania Woods, regarding his prices: 'Too pricey.': -25%; 'Just right.': unchanged; 'Too cheap.': +25%. If you didn't speak to him a second time earlier, these prices will be at their most expensive by default. Listed are the unchanged prices.

shops_data.name: macalania temple o'aka 2
shops_data.note: These prices are affected by the answer you gave O'aka in Macalania Woods, regarding his prices: 'Too pricey.': -25%; 'Just right.': unchanged; 'Too cheap.': +25%. If you didn't speak to him a second time earlier, these prices will be at their most expensive by default. Listed are the unchanged prices.

shops_data.name: airship travel agency
shops_data.note: Before you fight Evrae, Rin will move to the lift (cabin) with the exact same list.

shops_data.name: bevelle shop
shops_data.note: This shop opens when you open the first treasure chest.

shops_data.name: calm lands travel agency 1
shops_data.note: This is a one-time-only shop. Once you leave the Calm Lands, or enter the Arena, this shop will disappear. The Buckler with Magic Counter is a one of a kind armor, as it holds a weapon ability.

shops_data.name: calm lands monster arena shop
shops_data.note: Clear Spheres become available once you have unlocked Ultima Buster.

shops_data.name: mount gagazet wantz
shops_data.note: If you don't speak to Wantz at Gagazet, he won't be in the Macalania Woods after obtaining the Airship.

shops_data.name: macalania woods wantz
shops_data.note: Wantz will only appear if you talked to him on Mount Gagazet and if you completed the Highbridge section after obtaining the airship.
